c1.name: Kyouka Fuushi
c1.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Shunsuiken</color> DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.
c1.description: Shunsuiken DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

c2.name: World Source
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Namisen</color>'s maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.
c2.description: Namisen's maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

c3.name: To Admire the Flowers
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Kyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Endless Flow
c4.descriptionRaw: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color>, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.
c4.description: After using Kamisato Art: Suiyuu, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

c5.name: Bansui Ichiro
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Suiyuu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Boundless Origin
c6.descriptionRaw:
After using <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color>, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.
c6.description:
After using Kamisato Art: Kyouka, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.
